sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: SleepMix ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our Android application available on Google Play Store.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect the following personal information when you use certain features of the app:
items: Full name
Email address
Profile picture
In-app activity data (such as usage behavior and feature interaction)
Device information (device type, operating system version, unique device identifiers)

sections.title: How We Collect Data
items: Use specific features within the app (such as listening to sounds, selecting playlists)
View or interact with ads or in-app purchases
Grant permissions to the app (such as notification)
Contact our support team

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
sections.content: Your information is used for the following purposes:
items: To analyze user behavior and improve the app experience
To send notifications about new content or features
To personalize advertising content
To display ads and track their effectiveness
To manage user purchases and subscription access
To respond to your support requests and feedback
To prevent fraud and ensure app security
To comply with legal obligations

sections.title: Third-Party Data Sharing
sections.content: We may share limited data with third-party service providers that help us operate and improve the app, including:
items: Firebase (Google LLC): used for analytics, cloud storage, and push notifications
Google AdMob (Google LLC): used to serve advertisements and deliver personalized ads based on your app usage and behavior

Google Analytics for Firebase: used to analyze user behavior, measure session time, detect crashes, and improve app performance. Analytics data is collected in an anonymized form and does not include personally identifiable information
Google Play Services: used for app functionality and security

sections.title: User Rights
sections.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights:
items: Access your personal data
Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
Request deletion of your personal data
Restrict or object to data processing
Data portability
Withdraw consent at any time
Opt out of personalized ads by adjusting your device settings

sections.title: Data Storage and Security
sections.content: We take your data security seriously:
items: Data is securely stored using Firebase and Cloudinary
We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or modification
Data is retained only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy
We use industry-standard encryption for data transmission
Regular security audits and updates are performed

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: SleepMix is intended for users aged 3 years and older. We comply with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and similar regulations worldwide.
items: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without verifiable parental consent
Parents/guardians can review, delete, or refuse further collection of their child's information
Child-specific content is designed to avoid collecting unnecessary personal information
Advertising to children is limited and age-appropriate

sections.title: Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in app functionality, legal obligations, or service providers. When we make material changes:
items: We will notify you through the app or by email
The "Last updated" date at the top of this policy will be revised
You may be asked to review and accept the updated policy
Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance

sections.title: In-App Purchases and Payments
sections.content: SleepMix may offer in-app purchases (IAP) to unlock premium features or content. All transactions are processed securely through Google Play Billing.
items: Payment processing is handled entirely by Google Play
We do not collect or store your payment details
Purchase history and subscription status are stored for functionality
Refunds are handled through Google Play's refund policy
Subscription management is available in your Google Play account settings

sections.title: Compliance with Laws
items: Google Play Developer Program Policies
General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA)
Other applicable privacy and data protection laws
